attributes.long-description:
The definitive PixelJunk Monsters™ experience!

Tikiman the Forest Defender is in trouble. Hordes of monsters are sweeping through his realm, hoping to chow down on his offspring – and it’s up to you to defend them.

By placing weapon towers at strategic points around the landscape, you can destroy the invaders and save the little ones. Collect treasure along the way to build up your arsenal and pay for new towers – countless waves of monsters are out to get the babies, so you need to be prepared to battle!

Featuring:

- Touchscreen controls complementing the legendary game play experience
- Both online and adhoc co-operative play.
- Everything that you loved about PixelJunk Monsters™, faithfully created in high definition:

o 21 original Tiki Island levels and 24 Challenge levels
o 11 additional stages of Gati Gati Island
o 15 additional levels of Toki Island with levels inspired by arcade classics

- New trophies designed for those who like a challenge

1 player(s)
Ad Hoc Mode 2 Players
Network Players - 2
Network Features
2KB Minimum
Touchscreen

This item is being licensed or sublicensed to you by Sony Computer Entertainment America and is subject to the Network Terms of Service and User Agreement, this item’s use restrictions and other applicable terms located at www.us.playstation.com/support/useragreements. If you do not wish to accept all these terms, do not download this item. This item may be used with up to 2 activated PlayStation®Vita systems associated with this Sony Entertainment Network account. 

Some functions and features may not be available on PlayStation TV.

attributes.name: PixelJunk Monsters: Ultimate HD
